about_the_game:
【Background Story】

The game is set on a remote island research base where scientists are studying a mysterious wormhole. During an experiment, the wormhole suddenly emits strange signals, causing all the researchers to mutate into powerful monsters. The player will take on the role of a special forces soldier, tasked with saving the island by eliminating all the mutant monsters, uncovering the secrets behind the incident, and protecting the world's safety.

【Gameplay Features】

Free exploration and combat
Players can freely explore various areas of the island and engage in combat with mutant monsters. Each area has its unique map and features, requiring players to use different strategies and weapons to face various challenges.

Diversity of mutant monsters
The mutant monsters come in different types, each with its unique abilities and weaknesses. Players need to understand different types of monsters and use corresponding strategies and weapons to defeat them.

Variety of weapons and equipment
The game offers a range of weapons and equipment for players to choose and use, including shotguns, pistols, sniper rifles, melee weapons, grenades, etc. Players can collect resources or complete tasks to obtain more advanced weapons and equipment.

Survival elements
The game also incorporates survival elements where players need to manage their character's health, water sources, and food to maintain vitality and stamina.

Realistic weather system
The game features day-night cycles, changing weather conditions, and different time periods, affecting the abilities of the monsters.

short_description: You are lost in the sea while driving a fishing boat, encountering severe thunderstorms and stranded on a remote island filled with strange things and monsters. You need to survive on the island and fight against unknown monsters to uncover the unknown side of the island.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Traditional Chinese
